attributes.action: In any future referendum on EU membership extend voting rights
attributes.additional_details: The 2016 referendum was completely unrepresentative of people who would be affected by the result because it failed to take into account the wishes of any of the above.
attributes.background:
Voting rights should be extended to include:
UK citizens resident in other EU states
EU citizens resident in the UK
In both categories citizens aged 16 and above
